title: Game Progress Route
content:
her superior, leaving them immobilized. Overhearing Dolor mention a gift for Lord Bhaal, you can react with:

Halt! Step back. That's my target. [Stealth] Remain concealed as the dwarf is distracted.

Choose the first option (Astarion Disapproves), prompting Dolor to acknowledge a challenger and triggering another battle. After defeating Dolor, the quest "Investigate the Murders" is updated. Once the enemies are vanquished, Devella expresses gratitude for your rescue. She explains that Doppelgan
